name: X-Cell Aviation
about: X-Cell Aviation, LLC, is Southern Indiana's premier flight training facility, based at Evansville Regional Airport. As the #1 flight school in the region, X-Cell Aviation offers comprehensive flight training programs, including private pilot certification. The school is committed to providing high-quality instruction with experienced pilots who guide students from the initial stages to achieving their flying goals. In addition to flight training, X-Cell Aviation also assists with aircraft purchasing, ensuring clients find the right plane for their needs. With a focus on personalized training and exceptional service, X-Cell Aviation is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their dreams. Contact us at (812) 781-8855 or visit www.X-CellAviation.com for more information. We look forward to helping you take to the skies.
